SENT.plain: We present the case of a 23 years old female with chronic granulocytic leukemia and two intracranial tumors with all the radiological characteristics of intracranial meningiomas
Successful removal of the largest tumor was accomplished using the technique described for meningiomas
The recovery was very good and the histopathologic diagnosis was of granulocytic sarcoma
Radiotherapy of the second tumor reduced the tumor mass within one month leaving the patient neurologically intact
We recommended surgery in the future treatment of large chloromas
